item.description:
The much quicker way to the path of Wealth is to AVOID:
-Overpaying taxes
-IRS problems
-Incompetent advisors
-Lawsuits
-Other legal detriments!

You will learn how to save thousands with Al Aiello’s Presentation


Al will show us where the Real Hidden Powers of the LLC’s are and he will also share with us how to:

• Shield your personal assets from attachment
• Become “Lawyer repellent” with Al’s Power Attorney Letter (Al’s student saved $11,000)
• Prevent legal disputes saving you lawyer fees and stress
• Protect your property equity with a little-known yet powerful technique
• Defend yourself against nasty IRS attacks
• Legally deduct all of your educational and start-up expenses even without having yet done a deal - These tax savings can be a major windfall for you this year!
• Enable you to successfully operate your real estate business
• Save Much More!

Don’t miss this GOLDEN OPPORTUNITY to hear a foremost wealth-protection expert. Seating is limited.

Price for EMREIA members is $39.00
Price for Guests is $59.00

It's Tax Season and you don't want to miss this seminar

group.name: EMREIA-Eastern Mass Real Estate Investors Assoc.

item.name: EMREIA presents Al Aiello, as he shares Tax-Saving Secrets Your CPA Doesn't Know
